duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently create, evaluate, improve, and optimize product designs through CAD, simulation, complex analysis, and advanced 3D prototyping.
Lead assigned projects, proactively communicating directly to customers and vendors as the Subject Matter Expert to find high quality solutions.
Provide technical guidance and assistance to manufacturing including during pilot production, part revision, material change trials, and generation of PPAP documentation.
Independently prepare basic and complex RFQs and POs to tooling and other vendor partners.
Support management with product requirements, product data, and simulation results that enable BRI to win new design, product, and tooling projects.
Successfully complete all individual annual professional development goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science (BS) in Plastics/Mechanical/Materials Engineering (Master's preferred)
